addr: 845 United Nations Plaza (1st Avenue) & 48th Street, New York City, NY. 845 United Nations Plaza (1st Avenue) & 48th Street, New York City, NY. NEW YORK, NY 10017
title: ATWYS/NYSN New & Existing Member Happy Hour
desc: Single? New in town? Just looking to get out and meet new people? Join us for our multi-group member happy hour! ATWYS along with New York Social Network organizes a monthly Saturday night get together for all of our new and existing members.  If you are new to our Meteup group or a long time member, this is a fun night to meet others and find out what what we have planned in the coming months. Event Host, New York Social Network? founder Dave Cervini will be on hand with our staff to welcome all New Members and introduce you to our long time members.? You will enjoy drink specials,? complimentary hot and cold appetizers and lot's of room to socialize network and connect. Other Meet Up and Social Networking groups/organizations often invite their members so you also get to network with people from similiar groups.
